title: If you hate riven and yasuo then pick the chaos side.
body: At least with chaos you may reach the destiny where both lose and maybe your ideal ending is reached. It aint ever going to happen though if the order side wins. That scumbag wont let anyone reign above her.

replies.body: ~~He low key wants Yasuo to win, but sees far more Order icons around.~~
true order is nothingness, this man lies to bring about more chaotic sillyness!
